name: coachmeld-monorepo
description: CoachMeld monorepo containing mobile app, admin dashboard, landing page, and shared packages

scripts.dev: echo 'Please specify which app to run:'
scripts.build:web: cd apps/mobile && bun expo export -p web
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/shared-types && npm run build && cd ../shared-config && npm run build && cd ../shared-utils && npm run build
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:mobile && bun run type-check:admin
scripts.lint: bun run lint:mobile && bun run lint:admin
scripts.test: bun run test:mobile && bun run test:admin
scripts.test:watch: echo 'Run test:watch:mobile or test:watch:admin to watch specific app tests'
scripts.npm:install:all: npm ci && cd apps/mobile && npm ci && cd ../admin && npm ci
scripts.npm:install:fresh: npm install && cd apps/mobile && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.npm:clean:install: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json apps/*/node_modules apps/*/package-lock.json && npm install

author: NoiseMeld
